column2: he Plaintiff was 83 years of age at the time he gave evidence in 2002. He stated that:
he had known the Defendant for about 25 – 30 years;
he and his son were engaged in money lending;
he has had financial transactions with the Defendant on several occasions;
he received a message from Danatunga asking him to call over at the residence of
he went to the residence of the Defendant.
